title: Script type font is elusive - Help Identifying
content:
I would like to know the name of this font. The client cannot remember the name and of course we must recreate some elements. I've seen what you guys do and how quickly you do it. You're amazing. Much thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016020136im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HeartGalleryFont_4408.png)
author: VelocityIdeas

comments.content: Nick, like I said before... Absolutely amazing! Thank you for that.
You're welcome. Not that amazing if you know what it is.
